words.source: H3372 art. + Qal ptc. ms of יָרֵא 'to fear'; KJV 'he that feared', ESV 'whoever feared', NASB 'the one among the servants of Pharaoh who feared'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H1697 n.ms constr. davar 'word'; KJV 'the word of', ESV 'the word of', NASB 'the word of'
H3068 divine name, Tetragrammaton; KJV 'the LORD', ESV 'the LORD', NASB 'the LORD'
H5650 prep. min + n.mp constr. ʿeved 'servant'; KJV 'among the servants of', ESV 'among the servants of', NASB 'among the servants of'
H6547 proper name; all trans. agree
H5127 Hiphil perf. 3ms of נוּס 'to flee'; KJV 'made … flee', ESV 'hurried', NASB 'brought'
H853 direct object marker; untranslated in English
H5650 n.mp constr. ʿeved 'servant' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his servants', ESV 'his slaves', NASB 'his servants'
H853 waw + direct object marker; KJV 'and', ESV 'and', NASB 'and'
H4735 n.ms constr. miqneh 'livestock' + 3ms suff.; KJV 'his cattle', ESV 'his livestock', NASB 'his livestock'
H413 prep. 'to, toward'; KJV 'into', ESV 'into', NASB 'to'
H1004 art. + n.mp bayit 'house'; KJV 'the houses', ESV 'the houses', NASB 'the houses'
